titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Scientific Monthly Board of Editors Minutes
Yale Scientific Monthly Board of Editors Minutes
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday March 2, 2019 at 08:03

did.unittitle: Yale Scientific Monthly board of editors minutes

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of meeting minutes of The Yale Scientific Monthly board of editors.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 31-E (YRG 31-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Sheffield Scientific School.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The materials were a gift of Sameer Gupta, 2009.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Scientific Monthly Board of Editors Minutes (RU 1103). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Yale Scientific Monthly was published by the senior class of the Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, from 1894-1913. In 1913, the title was changed to the Yale Sheffield Monthly , which was superseded by the Yale Graphic in 1919.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of meeting minutes of The Yale Scientific Monthly board of editors.
